job_details.Functieomschrijving:
What makes Cognizant a unique place to work? The combination of rapid growth and an international and innovative environment! This is creating a lot of opportunities for people like YOU - people with an entrepreneurial spirit who want to make a difference in this world.
   At Cognizant, together with your colleagues from all around the world, you will collaborate on creating solutions for the world's leading companies and help them become more flexible, more innovative and successful. And this is your chance to be part of the success story: we are looking for a Gen AI Engineer to join our Artificial Intelligence & Analytics Team.

   Your team:
   About Cognizant Digital Business - Artificial Intelligence & Analytics
   We help our customers leverage Artificial Intelligence and analytics in building technology solutions to improve the quality of human life. We are the market leaders in the data and analytic space with 22,000+ information & data management, AI and analytics professional helping more than 650+ customers across the globe to build and run intelligent businesses, using an AI-first, human-centric, platform driven and design thinking approach
   For more information? Please visit https://www.cognizant.com/ai

   Your role and Responsibilities:
   As a GenAI engineer, you will play a crucial role in GenAI projects, contributing significantly to the development of impactful and responsible user-centered products and services. Drawing upon your expertise in both quantitative and qualitative research, you will strategically identify optimal methods to inspire, guide, and formulate the GenAI data architecture-from having a strong knowledge of Gen AI alogorithms to using wide variety of AI/ML techniques to solve business problems. We seek an individual comfortable with uncertainty, possessing excellent communication skills, and showcasing a blend of rigor and creativity when tackling open-ended questions, shaping early ideas, and rigorously testing GenAI solutions.
   * Design and implement Gen AI use cases for major institutions for their business problems.
   * Use visualization tools/modules to be able to explore and analyze outcomes & for Model validation eg: using Power BI / Tableau
   * Build CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment

   What we offer:
   * A competitive salary based on your qualities and experience.
   * Access to Udemy, Cognizant Academy digital libraries for your continuous learning.
   * NS business card to cover your commute expenses.
   * 25 days of paid holiday per year.
   * A laptop and a smartphone.
   * A pension scheme.
   * Organization driven by technology - we have a tremendous technology backbone.
   * Open, 'can do' team spirit and international environment that encourages making your ideas reality!

   What you will bring to the team:
   Strong expertise in
   ? Generative AI
   ? Machine Learning
   ? Power BI / Tableau
   ? CI/CD pipelines
   Nice to have skills -
   * Good communication & interfacing skills and able to work in a structured manner
   * Strong in collaboration, flexibility and showing entrepreneurship
   * Eager to be open to learn, advice & implement new technologies

   Diversity and Inclusion at Cognizant:
   At Cognizant, we believe diversity and inclusion are at the heart of our ability to execute successfully and consistently over the long term. We recognize that our people are our most important asset. We strive to create an environment where all associates feel comfortable to be themselves, feel accepted and can therefore thrive both personally and professionally. We continue to drive D&I throughout our organization to unlock the insights, imagination and innovation of our associates, as well as reflect the diversity of our clients and communities. We are a Dutch and European Top Employer and continually drive employment recognition and engagement through employee friendly policies and affinity groups such as "Women Empowered", "Embrace LGBTQ+" and "Race Equality Network". For more information, see https://careers.cognizant.com/global/en/diversity-and-inclusion

   Recruiter contact details:
   Name - Shilpa Kapur
   Email address - "Om te solliciteren, klik op de Monsterboard - solliciteerknop"

   Employee Status : Full Time Employee

   Shift : Day Job

   Travel : No

   Job Posting : Dec 14 2023

   About Cognizant
   Cognizant (Nasdaq-100: CTSH) is one of the world's leading professional services companies, transforming clients' business, operating and technology models for the digital era. Our unique industry-based, consultative approach helps clients envision, build and run more innovative and efficient businesses. Headquartered in the U.S., Cognizant is ranked 185 on the Fortune 500 and is consistently listed among the most admired companies in the world. Learn how Cognizant helps clients lead with digital at www.cognizant.com or follow us @Cognizant.

   Over het bedrijf:
   Cognizant
   Our diverse community of 300,000+ people are working together to help transform the companies the world relies on. And when we're not developing game-changing digital solutions for clients, we're improving lives elsewhere by volunteering in local communities, fostering inclusion through our employee affinity groups and so much more. We apply the same intuition-driven approach we bring our clients to our own organization. We support our high-performing team with the tools they need to gain insight and speed-so they can respond in real time to everyday challenges, while growing their skills and advancing their careers. Wherever they are, our people engineer intuition-with their clients, communities, colleagues and in their own lives.

   Bedrijfsgrootte:
   Meer dan 10000 werknemers

   Branche:
   Uitzendbureaus / Werving & Selectie

   Oprichtingsjaar:
   0

   Website:
   http://www.cognizant.com
job_details.full_text:
Gen AI Engineer

What makes Cognizant a unique place to work? The combination of rapid growth and an international and innovative environment! This is creating a lot of opportunities for people like YOU - people with an entrepreneurial spirit who want to make a difference in this world.
   At Cognizant, together with your colleagues from all around the world, you will collaborate on creating solutions for the world's leading companies and help them become more flexible, more innovative and successful. And this is your chance to be part of the success story: we are looking for a Gen AI Engineer to join our Artificial Intelligence & Analytics Team.

   Your team:
   About Cognizant Digital Business - Artificial Intelligence & Analytics
   We help our customers leverage Artificial Intelligence and analytics in building technology solutions to improve the quality of human life. We are the market leaders in the data and analytic space with 22,000+ information & data management, AI and analytics professional helping more than 650+ customers across the globe to build and run intelligent businesses, using an AI-first, human-centric, platform driven and design thinking approach

   Your role and Responsibilities:

Drawing upon your expertise in both quantitative and qualitative research, you will strategically identify optimal methods to inspire, guide, and formulate the GenAI data architecture-from having a strong knowledge of Gen AI alogorithms to using wide variety of AI/ML techniques to solve business problems. We seek an individual comfortable with uncertainty, possessing excellent communication skills, and showcasing a blend of rigor and creativity when tackling open-ended questions, shaping early ideas, and rigorously testing GenAI solutions.
   * Design and implement Gen AI use cases for major institutions for their business problems.
   * Use visualization tools/modules to be able to explore and analyze outcomes & for Model validation eg: using Power BI / Tableau

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes Generative AI, including designing and implementing GenAI use cases, and mentions expertise in Generative AI and Machine Learning. It also highlights building CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.

evidence.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to understand and address business challenges using AI techniques.

evidence.phrase: Design and implement Gen AI use cases for major institutions for their business problems.
evidence.justification: This explicitly states the role involves applying GenAI to solve specific business issues for clients.
This implies designing and structuring the data systems necessary for GenAI models.

evidence.phrase: expertise in both quantitative and qualitative research
evidence.justification: This suggests a deep understanding of data analysis and model building approaches.

evidence.phrase: strong knowledge of Gen AI alogorithms
evidence.justification: Directly refers to the understanding and application of generative AI algorithms.

evidence.phrase: using wide variety of AI/ML techniques
evidence.justification: Indicates the application of various machine learning and AI methods for problem-solving.
This is a core technology area for generative AI modeling.
This is a foundational skill for building and adapting AI models.

evidence.phrase: development of impactful and responsible user-centered products and services
evidence.justification: This indicates the role involves building and deploying AI into user-facing applications.
Testing is a crucial part of the software development lifecycle for ensuring quality and functionality.

evidence.phrase: Build CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment
evidence.justification: This is a direct indicator of MLOps practices for automating model deployment.
Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment are key components of MLOps.
While not a cloud platform in the typical sense, it's a digital resource provided by the company for learning, often hosted on cloud infrastructure.
Refers to Generative Artificial Intelligence models.
Explicitly mentions the domain of generative models.

evidence.phrase: CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment
evidence.justification: CI/CD pipelines are a core part of MLOps for automating software and model delivery.
Directly names a key MLOps tool/practice.
A well-known data visualization and business intelligence tool.
Another prominent data visualization and business intelligence tool.

evidence.phrase: Use visualization tools/modules to be able to explore and analyze outcomes & for Model validation eg: using Power BI / Tableau
evidence.justification: Explicitly mentions the use of visualization tools for analysis and model validation.
Machine learning encompasses data modeling techniques.
These are fundamental approaches to data analysis.
Directly refers to the process of analyzing data.
Directly states the requirement for strong communication abilities.
Highlights the importance of communication and interaction skills.
Explicitly mentions the need for collaborative work.
Indicates the need to work effectively with diverse groups.

evidence.phrase: Eager to be open to learn, advice & implement new technologies
evidence.justification: Shows a clear desire for continuous learning and adopting new technologies.

evidence.phrase: adapt to new technologies, tools, and methodologies in a rapidly evolving field
evidence.justification: This phrase directly speaks to the need for adaptability in a fast-changing field.
Suggests an ability to handle ambiguous situations and find solutions.

evidence.phrase: blend of rigor and creativity when tackling open-ended questions
evidence.justification: Indicates a balanced approach to problem-solving, combining analytical and creative methods.

evidence.phrase: shaping early ideas, and rigorously testing GenAI solutions
evidence.justification: Implies a practical, results-oriented approach to developing and validating solutions.
The core of problem-solving is addressing issues, in this case, business-related ones.
Highlights the importance of developing AI solutions ethically and with user well-being in mind.
Suggests a proactive and innovative mindset.
Directly indicates a need for an entrepreneurial and proactive approach.
Encourages initiative and the drive to implement new concepts.
